pullRequest.body:
We also move it out of the initial segment file - it doesn't need that machinery to be proven.

---

```suggestion
theorem Acc.of_subrel {r : Î± â†’ Î± â†’ Prop} [IsTrans Î± r] {b : Î±} (a : { a // r a b })
```

```suggestion
/-- A relation `r` is well-founded iff every downward-interval `{ a | r a b }` of it is well-founded. -/
```
Let's be more explicit here, especially because we're not claiming that every interval is well-founded

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore(Order/RelIso/Set): golf `wellFounded_iff_wellFounded_subrel`
